title: Pixel 1 Mic problem
content:
Hi I live in Turkey. I have a Pixel 1 and Mic stop working suddenly. I'm loyal google user. N4-5-5x vs
I have tried so many things factory reset vs vs google services but nothing help me. 

I like to buy another pixel phone but it seems lots of Pixel has a same problem. 

Google officially doesn't sell Pixel phones. But Ä± bought this phone in warranty by D-Market Hepsiburada.com
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
